body_html:
For the time being, Keras models should be built with Keras layers, not with TensorFlow layers. We plan on allowing the use of TensorFlow layers in Keras models in the near future, though.

This is not a limitation since all TensorFlow layers are in Keras (albeit the reverse is not true).
body_text:
For the time being, Keras models should be built with Keras layers, not with TensorFlow layers. We plan on allowing the use of TensorFlow layers in Keras models in the near future, though.
This is not a limitation since all TensorFlow layers are in Keras (albeit the reverse is not true).
body:
For the time being, Keras models should be built with Keras layers, not with TensorFlow layers. We plan on allowing the use of TensorFlow layers in Keras models in the near future, though.

This is not a limitation since all TensorFlow layers are in Keras (albeit the reverse is not true).
